title: Project 1: Expository visualization (DSC106)
description: Created a bubble chart examining how climate varies across the U.S. by analyzing the average sunshine, rainfall, and dryness index per month in various cities.

title: Project 2: Deceptive Visualization (DSC106)
description: Created an earnest and a deceptive visualization using line plots comparing female and male mice activity levels.

title: Project 3: Interactive Visualization (DSC106)
description: Will create an interactive scatter plot comparing student test scores across various biometrics.

title: Bone Fracture Detection
description: Built and optimized deep learning models (CNN, Vision Transformer, EfficientNetB0) to identify bone fractures in medical imagery.

title: Food Recipe Analysis
description: Analyzed the correlation between saturated fat content and recipe ratings through hypothesis testing by designing and implementing a regression model to evaluate how preparation time impacts recipe ratings.

title: Productivity-Tracking Game
description: Designed and coded an interactive text-based program utilizing game mechanics to encourage task completion.

title: IoT Weather Indicator
description: Created a Raspberry Pi weather indicator with color-coded lighting for conditions.

title: Smile Recognition
description: Built a Python-based model on Raspberry Pi to detect smiles using a 400-face dataset.

title: Tic-tac-toe Game
description: Built a text-based tic-tac-toe game as my first Python project.

title: HTML Website
description: Built a simple HTML website introducing a location of choice.

title: Magic 8-ball
description: Built a text-based magic 8-ball game that takes in user inputs and randomly generates 'Yes', 'No', or 'Maybe'.

title: Guess the Letter Game
description: Developed a letter guessing game where the computer picks a random word, and the player has to guess the letters in it within a limited number of attempts.
